card.text: Ascend to godhood (If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.) Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if you've reached godhood, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Herald of Forbiddance
card.text: Flying Each opponent can cast instant spells or spells with flash only any time they could cast a sorcery. Herald of Forbiddance has hexproof as long as it's tapped.

card.name: Moment of Ascendance
card.text: When Moment of Ascendance enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant permanent. Search your library for an enchantment or land card, put it onto the battlefield, shuffle, and attach Moment of Ascendance to it. Enchanted permanent is a 4/4 green God creature.

card.name: Gateway to the Impossible
card.text: Choose a nonland card type. When you do, target opponent chooses a player. Reveal cards from the top of the chosen player's library until you reveal a card of the chosen type. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then the chosen player shuffles.

card.name: Sonata of Creation
card.text: Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If X is five or more, you may instead search your library for any number of creature cards with total mana value X or less, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Demigod KSH
card.text: Flying
